dao

Class CompanyDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.CompanyDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompanyDAO

    public class CompanyDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompanyDAO
    The class Company is the class that do all the required access work with DB using the methods below. implements CompanyDAO and apply the following methods. this class using the SqlQueries class for all the SQL queries in all methods.
    Author:
    chaim_chagbi

      • getID

        public long getID(java.lang.String companyName)
           throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                  java.sql.SQLException,
                  java.lang.InterruptedException,
                  SystemGoingDownException
        Checks if database contains company with specified name. If company exists returns its id, otherwise -1.
        Parameters:
        companyName - - String representing specified company name to check
        Returns:
        id of company if it exists in DB, otherwise -1
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        SystemGoingDownException
